channel.title: Bbpress on Martin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Bbpress on Martin's Blog

item.title: Welcome to my OSS forum
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: Now this forum is open for registration. Please feel free to post any of your idea or question. I hope you will have fun. http://www.martinliu.cn/forum 论坛开张了:) 欢迎加入我的开源论坛！

item.title: Should I open a forum on my site?
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: 这个论坛软件看似还不错，而且号称简单、快速和优雅，比较吸引我。我的blog后台是Wordpress的，所以理论上讲可以和这个软件很好的集成，
